member.summary: Manages selection of multiple GUI elements.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUISelect.SetState(UnityEditor.Editor,System.Collections.IList,System.Int32)
member.summary: Call this after each selectable GUI block, to calculate and draw the current selection state. Return TRUE while the item at the given index is selected.
member.param: Reference to the panel calling this method (used for Repaint purposes)
List containig the selectable items
Index of the last selectable item block drawn

member.summary: Call this after each selectable GUI block, to calculate and draw the current selection state. Return TRUE while the item at the given index is selected.
member.param: Reference to the panel calling this method (used for Repaint purposes)
List containig the selectable items
Index of the last selectable item block drawn
Color to apply when selecting

member.summary: Call this after each selectable GUI block, to calculate and draw the current selection state. Return TRUE while the item at the given index is selected.
member.param: Reference to the panel calling this method (used for Repaint purposes)
List containig the selectable items
Index of the last selectable item block drawn

member.summary: Call this after each selectable GUI block, to calculate and draw the current selection state. Return TRUE while the item at the given index is selected.

List containig the selectable items
Index of the last selectable item block drawn
Color to apply when selecting

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUISelect.GetSelectedIndexes
member.summary: Returns the currently selected indexes in the selection list, or an empty list if none is selected.

member.name: T:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag
member.summary: Manages drag of GUI elements.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag.StartDrag(UnityEditor.Editor,System.Collections.IList,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Starts a drag operation on a GUI element.
member.param: Reference to the current editor drawing the GUI (used when a Repaint is needed)
List containing the dragged item and all other relative draggable items
Item being dragged
DraggableList index of the item being dragged
Optional data that can be retrieved via the static property

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag.StartDrag(UnityEditor.EditorWindow,System.Collections.IList,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Starts a drag operation on a GUI element.
member.param: Reference to the current editor drawing the GUI (used when a Repaint is needed)
List containing the dragged item and all other relative draggable items
Item being dragged
DraggableList index of the item being dragged
Optional data that can be retrieved via the static property

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag.Drag(System.Collections.IList,System.Int32)
member.summary: Call this after each draggable GUI block, to calculate and draw the current drag state (or complete it if the mouse was released). Returns TRUE if the drag operation was concluded and accepted.
member.param: List containing the draggable item and all other relative draggable items
Current index of the draggable item being drawn

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag.Drag(System.Collections.IList,System.Int32,UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Call this after each draggable GUI block, to calculate and draw the current drag state (or complete it if the mouse was released). Returns TRUE if the drag operation was concluded and accepted.
member.param: List containing the draggable item and all other relative draggable items
Current index of the draggable item being drawn
Color to use for drag divider and selection

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag.EndDrag(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ends the drag operations, and eventually applies the drag result. Returns TRUE if the position of the dragged item actually changed.
member.param: If TRUE applies the drag results, otherwise simply cancels the drag

member.name: P:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag.isDragging
member.summary: True if a GUI element is currently being dragged

member.name: P:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag.draggedItem
member.summary: Return the current item being dragged, or NULL if there is none.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag.draggedItemType
member.summary: Type of current item being dragged, or NULL if there is none.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.HOGUIDrag.optionalDragData
member.summary: Retrieves the eventual optional data stored via the StartDrag method.

member.name: T:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.Utils.HOEditorUndoManager
member.summary:
Editor undo manager. To use it:
Store an instance in the related Editor Class (instantiate it inside the OnEnable method).
Call undoManagerInstance.CheckUndo() BEFORE the first UnityGUI call in OnInspectorGUI.
Call undoManagerInstance.CheckDirty() AFTER the last UnityGUI call in OnInspectorGUI.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.Utils.HOEditorUndoManager.#ctor(UnityEngine.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new HOEditorUndoManager, setting it so that the target is marked as dirty each time a new undo is stored.
member.param: The default you want to save undo info for.
The default name of the thing to undo (displayed as "Undo [name]" in the main menu).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.Utils.HOEditorUndoManager.#ctor(UnityEngine.Object,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new HOEditorUndoManager.
member.param: The default you want to save undo info for.
The default name of the thing to undo (displayed as "Undo [name]" in the main menu).
If TRUE, marks the target as dirty each time a new undo is stored.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.Utils.HOEditorUndoManager.CheckUndo
member.summary: Call this method BEFORE any undoable UnityGUI call. Manages undo for the default target, with the default name.

member.param: The you want to save undo info for.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.Utils.HOEditorUndoManager.CheckDirty
member.summary: Call this method AFTER any undoable UnityGUI call. Manages undo for the default target, with the default name, and returns a value of TRUE if the target is marked as dirty.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOEditorGUIFramework.Utils.HOEditorUndoManager.ForceDirty
member.summary: Call this method AFTER any undoable UnityGUI call. Forces undo for the default target, with the default name. Used to undo operations that are performed by pressing a button, which doesn't set the GUI to a changed state.

member.param: The you want to save undo info for.
